description: Try our easy to follow Pea & Mint Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pea & Mint Risotto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 150g frozen or fresh peas, cover with boiling water for 3 minutes, then drain (if using frozen)

recipeInstructions.text: First, pour the stock into a large pan, and heat to a gentle simmer.

Heat the oil and butter in a large nonstick frying pan over a low heat. Add the onion and a pinch of salt. Sweat for about 5 minutes until soft and translucent, then stir through the rice, making sure that the grains are completely coated. Increase the heat to medium-high, pour in the wine, and let it simmer for a couple of minutes until the alcohol has evaporated.

Reduce the heat slightly, and add the simmering stock a ladleful or two at a time, stirring frequently with a wooden spoon; when each addition of stock has been absorbed, add some more. Continue like this for about 20 minutes until the rice is cooked; it should still have a bite to it. Use more or less stock as required  every risotto is different.
Stir through the peas, Parmesan, mint, and basil. Season well with salt and black pepper, and serve hot.
